Quote: It's not the face that makes someone a monster; it's the choices they make with their lives.
Power comes in response to a need, not a desire. You have to create that need.
A lesson without pain is meaningless. That’s because you cannot gain something without sacrificing something else in return.
To know sorrow is not terrifying. What is terrifying is to know you can’t go back to the happiness you could have had.
Fear is not evil. It tells you what your weakness is. And once you know your weakness, you can become stronger as well as kinder.
Sometimes, people are just mean. Don’t fight mean with mean, hold your head high.
It’s not the world that’s messed up; it’s those of us in it.
We don’t have to know what tomorrow holds! That’s why we can live for everything we’re worth today!
The moment you think of giving up, think of the reason why you held on so long.
The world isn’t perfect. But it’s there for us, doing the best it can...that’s what makes it so damn beautiful.
In this world, wherever there is light, there are also shadows.
No one knows what the future holds. That’s why its potential is infinite.
There are no regrets. If one can be proud of one's life, one should not wish for another chance.
When you lose sight of your path, listen for the destination in your heart.
People’s lives don’t end when they die, it ends when they lose faith.
Even if we forget the faces of our friends, we will never forget the bonds that were carved into our souls.
I don’t care if no one likes me. I wasn’t created in this world to entertain everyone.
A bond is a deep connection that cannot be broken.
I always thought that life was about standing your ground, no matter how strong the current was. But going with the flow isn't so bad after all.
Even if you're weak, there are miracles you can seize with your hands if you fight for them.
